Posts.Content: Trust me there is no alternative,I have begged all my doctors for something and any drug that they give me will do the same. The flashes & weight gain is a side effect,stopping it will give it a chance to go elsewhere. I have been on it for 9 months. I done the vitamin store. I just bought Wii to do some movements and stuff in hopes i can loose some weight!
Posts.Title: Her 2 Positive Breast Cancer ... Help !!

Posts.Content: I was told that I must take Femara for 5 years! I have complained about the weight gain and flashes and wanted my drug changed but any drug will do the same he said but I must stay on it and never stop it. Try to call the Cancer Society & see if they know of someone that can see to it u get your meds!
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen AND Femara

Posts.Content: Dont stop femara,if u want to change ask ur uncologist Im on Femara about 9 months and now have onset of osteo,I figured it was genetic! I have weight gain,hot flashes as a result from Femara,I would not stop concidering the alternative. As for the Osteo. more milk,cheese and vegatables for more calcium

Posts.Content: I was told that Tamoxifen can cause a elevation in liver enzmes that is why your doctor does regular blood tests to keep a watch on this. I have regular blood test for different thing,i also have a increase in weight gain and hot flashes all from Tamoxifen,so my doctors say!
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and elevated liver enzymes

Posts.Content: It is the Tamoxifen,it has given me weight gain and Hot flashes and when I complained to the cancer doctor he said its the Tamoxifen and any drug he gives me will do the same. The menopause also adds to your problem.
